plot: Agnes, a shy middle-aged woman has a miserable life and an immovable coffee-stain on her living-room carpet. Charles, a salesman, has a rug with some special peculiarities that he just can't get rid of. Can they do a deal?
title: Rug
plot_es: Agnes, a shy middle-aged woman has a miserable life and an immovable coffee-stain on her living-room carpet. Charles, a salesman, has a rug with some special peculiarities that he just can't get rid of. Can they do a deal?
